channel.title: FM Shrouded Town Wins!
channel.description:
## Welcome
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Mafia will talk through DM's They do not have a day chat. When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it **This game will not flip roles or alignments**
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone get's the majority of the votes they will be killed
### Journals There will be no logs or death notes in this game
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Rolelist: The role list is hidden. There will be no neutrals. Bastard roles and mechanics CAN exist. I have made sure the setup is balanced taking into account the special rules. Besides that make no assumptions.
> # [color = "green"] Citizen [/color] > > Your weapon is your vote. > > *goal - Eliminate all threats to the town*
Players: 1. Memesky - Alive 2. @Pug - Dead 3. @MaximusPrime - Alive 4. @methomps - Alive 5. @Whammerist - Alive 6. @Htm - Alive 7. @Moleland - Alive 8. @Sam17z - Alive 9. @Simon - Alive 10. @Livicus - Alive 11. @Marluxion - Alive
Co-host - Firekitten

So…

methomps:

What, like this is social commentary disguised as a game…we’re all town and the point is to see how much we will needlessly kill each other before we figure it out?

item.title: FM Shrouded Town Wins!
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
lemme make it official

Memesky has been modkilled!

Instigator

Passive 1: Vulnerable - You appear to be mafia in alignment checks. You cannot be saved from the mafia’s night kill. If you are killed by the mafia they will get 2 kills the next night
Passive 2: Back up - You must send a player name in your class card to be your backup. If that player dies, or is mafia (you will be told) you must send another name. If you die they will become this class. If you fail to chose someone then a random player will be chosen

Night Ability: Modified Compulsive Vigilante - Kill target player. If you fail for any reason then you cannot be stopped in the same way the next night. You will die if you fail to chose a target. (Unlimited)

goal: eliminate all threats to the town

Read full topic

item.title: FM Shrouded Town Wins!

item.description:
oh and the informed townie was an unaware miller. If he was killed then it would have the risk of his word being discredited and ignored.

item.title: FM Shrouded Town Wins!
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I hope not. Because as fun as stuff like this is it isn’t fair to have it outside of a bastard game without plenty of tools to figure out what is going on. Even with the bastard format I had a few tools to figure out what was happening.

If I was just trying to troll you I would have made the night kill pure RNG and not warned anyone about the false wincon

Read full topic

item.title: FM Shrouded Town Wins!
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The idea is that you would never no lynch twice in a row unless you legitimately thought there was no threats. I guess I forgot to take split votes and inactives into account.

Read full topic
